channel.title: Hug Font
channel.description:
Soo, I'm sorry if there was a more obvious place to find this information but I couldn't see any out right.
My question is where I might be able to find the text, preferably the numbers but the entire font would be fabulous, for BMS.
I'm starting to get acquainted with video capturing and editing softwares by doing a "lets play" series, wanted an excuse to replay as well. And I'd like to do a death counter which blends well with the hud, but I'd like it to be seamless.
So yeah, thanks in advanced for those which would be able to help me with this, thanks!
p.s. For those who are interested this is my lame attempt [url]https://youtu.be/rEz41W8UKiA[/url]

item.title: Hug Font
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Shouldn’t it be “HUD” font, not “Hug” font? For a second there I thought you wanted the font they use for logos in Care Bears or something…

Read full topic

item.title: Hug Font
